product_name: CliniqueAll About Clean Rinse Off Foaming Cleanser Mini
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique All About Clean Rinse-Off Foaming Cleanser is a cream-mousse cleanser that gently and effectively rinses away makeup. Now in a mini travel size.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Combination Oily, Oily.Purifying cleanser lathers into a rich foam.Rinses away pollution, dirt, excess oil, long-wearing makeup and sunscreen quickly, gently, effectively.Leaves oily skin feeling fresh and clean.Formulated with glycerin and hyaluronic acid for a softer, more conditioning cleanse.Non-drying. Non-stripping.Dermatologist tested.More sustainable packaging: Tube is minimum 39% post-consumer recycled material, 28% plant-derived plastic. Cap is 25% post-consumer recycled material.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilsDenatured AlcoholSLSSLESSulfatesGlutenFragranceItem 2590261How To UseLather between palms with lukewarm water. Massage gently over wet skin, avoiding eye area. Rinse off. Follow with Clarifying Lotion to clear the way for smoother, brighter skin.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Potassium Myristate, Glycerin, Potassium Behenate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Potassium Palmitate, Potassium Laurate, Potassium Sterate, PEG-3 Distearate, Cholesteryl Hydroxystearate, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Trisodium EDTA, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Ext. Violet 2 (CI 60730), Red 4 (CI 14700).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Lather between palms with lukewarm water. Massage gently over wet skin, avoiding eye area. Rinse off. Follow with Clarifying Lotion to clear the way for smoother, brighter skin.

reviews.headline: I have used this for years.
reviews.comments: I like that my feels clean after using it.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I love all my other clinique products but this does not meet the standard. A little goes a long way and it feels super silky smooth while washing (both pros) but it leaves a thin layer of film on my fash after washing, like a cheap bodywash leaves you sticky. My face feels tight, but not clean and refreshed tight. It feels sticky and unwashed. You HAVE to use a moisturizer after. I'll stick with my $8 pink grapefruit face wash.

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: I like that you don't need a lot to lather for your face. Sadly I still see some residual makeup on the cotton pad from applying the clarifying lotion afterwards but not terribly. This also doesn't appear to dry the skin out.

reviews.headline: I would most definitely buy this product again.
reviews.comments: See my comment from my Clarifying Lotion review.

reviews.headline: doesn't thoroughly clean my skin
reviews.comments: After using this face wash I follow up with the clarifying lotion/toner. The amount of dirt that appears on the cotton pad tells me that the wash isn't working. This happens even when I don't wear makeup.

reviews.headline: Perfect travel size
reviews.comments: So happy these now come in travel size!! Love this face wash.

reviews.headline: I have used this for the past 3 years and will continue to
reviews.comments: Great foaming cleanser and it leaves my skin feeling refreshed and hydrated but not in an oily way. I use it for shaving too and I never get razor bumps. Love this!!

reviews.headline: DO NOT BUY I BEG
reviews.comments: ok so i read some reviews and comments before buying thinking that this would be safe for my sensitive, combination, acne prone skin. WRONG. so wrong. it strips and i mean strips your face. i was so itchy afterwards, red flag number one. red flag number two?? my face the next morning was so so and i mean SO swollen, itchy, red and covered in splotchy hives. like i have never seen my skin react like this to any products. i am currently attempting to recover from this episode and am horrified by cliniques product, especially to whom they are marketing this too. maybe i shouldve read more comments, or maybe i should've done a tester patch before using but seriously guys do your research and read the ingredients (there is SLS in this product) and dont have a severe reaction like me. but honestly 0/5 stars.

reviews.headline: Avoid eyes
reviews.comments: Causes severely irritation

reviews.headline: Highly recommend for combo/dry skin
reviews.comments: Ive used this facewash for years i love how gebtle it is and how it removes my makeup effectively.

reviews.headline: Highly recommend for combo/dry skin
reviews.comments: Ive used this facewash for years i love how gebtle it is and how it removes my makeup effectively.

reviews.headline: I clean my face with the foaming face cleanser, I like it.
reviews.comments: Good for sensitive skin like mine.

reviews.headline: Great pick up service
reviews.comments: Always satisfied with the Clinique foaming facial cleanser.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I have been using Fenty beauty for years, but tried this face wash once I rinse I get that squeaky clean feel, while rinsing love it . I'm actually moving towards all face products regardless Clinique,

reviews.headline: Makes my skin feel clean
reviews.comments: The texture is beautiful. I love the way it creates a cream to a foam. My face felt clean. Being that i have a sensitivity to acrylates, and no cleansers works for me, this is my new go to.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: A small  amount creates a lot of lather.  My skin feels so clean afterwards.  I love this.

reviews.headline: Clinique Foaming Cleanser
reviews.comments: I love this facial cleanser! It cleans my skin without irritating my skin after use. I would definitely recommend this cleanser!

reviews.headline: Cliniques skincare line is garbage!!!
reviews.comments: This is more a detergent than a cleanser. It's drying and irritating. Triggered my sensitivity and my acne-prone skin. This is the 4th product ive tried from their skincare line. Won't be trying anymore items.

reviews.headline: This has been great for a long time
reviews.comments: This used to be advertised for oily skin, but theyve recently switched to it being for all skin types which is exactly true. It's so super soft, and like with the rest of clinique's products, its great on my sensitive skin. I've got oily, sensitive, acne-prone skin, and this always leaves me with that "rubber ducky" feeling. I wash my face twice a day every day and I still wont be finished with this before it's expired. It's the best value of any cleanser Ive tried. Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: Never again
reviews.comments: After just 2 days using this cleanser, I broke out terribly. That hasn't happened in 30+ yrs. I was using Clinique's All about clean oily skin formula but it left my skin dry so I switched to this one. Time to find another product

media.headline: THE BEST FACE WASH, HANDS DOWN.
media.caption: My skin in the AM after using this cleanser; I had a full face of makeup the day before.

media.headline: I absolutely love this product all my pimples gone away!
I absolutely love this product all my pimples gone away!
It is moisturizing an it helps get rid of acne on my face !

faceoff_positive.comments: I have such senstive skin and this was the first product i can use to wash my face and it doesn't dry me out. I use it everyday, i never get that tight feeling on my face and i love it. I highly recommend this for anyone who has senstive skin and have tried all other soaps and cleaners.
faceoff_positive.headline: LOVE IT

faceoff_negative.comments: This cleanser seemed to work pretty well at removing makeup on my face however it did leave a weird dry kinda feeling afterwards. I always had to wash my face immediately after using because I couldnt stand the feeling it left behind. It also leaves horrible soap scum looking mess in your sink.
faceoff_negative.headline: Leaves wierd kinda dry feeling on face

rollup.name: All About Clean Rinse Off Foaming Cleanser Mini
